quotes.quote: If there is any thing disagreeable going on, men are always sure to get out of it.
We have to be honest about what we want and take risks rather than lie to ourselves and make excuses to stay in our comfort zone.
The unknown makes people uncomfortable.
Sometimes life seems uncomfortable and that's actually when life starts.
They are uncomfortable talking about sex because they don't want people to think they know about it.
The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.
It's a disagreeable thing to be whipped.
Mere bashfulness without merit is awkwardness.
No one has the right to make where you go or what you do uncomfortable.
What is allowed us is disagreeable, what is denied us causes us intense desire.
Change is uncomfortable, but it's helpful!
We're supposed to be uncomfortable when we read something. That's how we learn.
Sometimes being uncomfortable is the only way to save yourself from settling.
Whatever makes you uncomfortable is your biggest opportunity for growth.
People are uncomfortable about disability, and so interactions can become unintentionally uncomfortable.
You can disagree without being disagreeable.
Be willing to be uncomfortable. Be comfortable being uncomfortable. It may get tough, but it's a small price to pay for living a dream.
True success is achieved by stretching oneself, learning to feel comfortable being uncomfortable.
Everyone has an uncomfortable club in their bag.
Comfort kills ambition. Get uncomfortable and get used to it in your pursuit of your goals and dreams.
The only time you are actually growing is when you are uncomfortable.
Uncertainty is an uncomfortable position. But certainty is an absurd one.
If you want to change you have to be willing to be uncomfortable.
The innocent seldom find an uncomfortable pillow.
Discomfort brings engagement and change. Discomfort means you're doing something that others were unlikely to do, because they're hiding out in the comfortable zone.
If you have learned how to disagree without being disagreeable, then you have discovered the secrete of getting along - whether it be business, family relations, or life itself.
Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!
The purpose of making people feel uncomfortable is to play with their preconceptions.
Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.

It is uncomfortable to keep your dreams in a house just behind a public toilet; your dreams will surely attract bad odours from the waste products of people in detracting environments. Keep it away from negative people!
